DataElement.preferredName: Neurological Evaluation Coordination Assessment Criterion Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text criteria to capture criteria used for an examination of the coordination/gait component on a neurological evaluation. [Manually-curated]

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated.
